text:
提供身份證正反影本及委任書完成線上委任報關。
請在App畫面左下角選擇「紙本委任」, 點選「新增」,報關行點選「FedEx」上傳證件及簽名。
iOS “EZ WAY 易利委” ~下載連結 [redacted_url]
Android “ EZ WAY 易利委 ” ~下載連結[redacted_url]
請至APP上傳''委任書''簽名+身分證正反面影本
建議您同時可申辦「實名認證」，可加速未來進口報關清關速度
如有問題:請洽FEDEX客服中心 [redacted_number]，謝謝您!
trans:
Provide a copy of the front and back of your ID card and the power of attorney to complete the online customs declaration authorization.
Please select "Paper Authorization" at the bottom left corner of the app screen, click "Add," and then select "FedEx" to upload your documents and signature.
iOS "EZ WAY" ~ Download link [redacted_url]
Android "EZ WAY" ~ Download link [redacted_url]
Please upload the 'Power of Attorney' signature + front and back copies of your ID card in the app.
It is recommended that you also apply for "Real Name Authentication," which can speed up future import customs clearance.
If you have any questions, please contact the FEDEX customer service center at [redacted_number]. Thank you!
